headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Black Friday Deals
content:
The only thing more traditional on Thanksgiving than overeating is shopping on Black Friday. To celebrate this American ritual, there is a selection of vehicles on sale in GTA Online from November 26 to November 29, as well as 40% off on all Super Yachts and their Upgrades, Renovations, and Modifications. Plus, 50% off the below:

- Pegassi Oppressor
- Imponte Deluxo
- Mammoth Avenger
- Ocelot Stromberg

And More! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
